df_heading: Understanding The Impact Of OPEC Countries On Global Crude Oil Prices
text: Crude oil is the most important commodity that's traded in the world, and is currently the primary source of energy production. Did you know that India imports 85% of its crude requirement? In fact, most countries are oil importers, since 13 countries, called OPEC countries, hold 80% of the world's proven crude reserves! In this episode of Commodity classroom, let's understand the impact of OPEC on crude oil prices - watch!
